mapper.select: SELECT t.trainjoinlistid, t.departmentname, t.personnelid, s.programname, s.starttheorydate, t.finallyexamdate, s.insideoutside, s.isonline, s.mandatory, s.isfirst, t.throughtype, t.performance, t.number FROM trainjoinlist AS t INNER JOIN startprogram AS s ON t.startprogramid = s.startprogramid ORDER BY t.departmentname ASC
